speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Since the beginning of this year, we have dealt with many unexpected events. The loss of life and income due to the worldwide pandemic has seriously affected the global community and economy.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Earthquakes, fires, and floods in different parts of the world, as well as other weather-related disasters, have left people feeling helpless, hopeless, and brokenhearted, wondering if their lives will ever be the same.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Let me tell you a personal story about brokenness.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: When our children were young, they decided they wanted to take piano lessons. My husband, Rudy, and I wanted to provide our children this opportunity, but we had no piano. We could not afford a new piano, so Rudy started looking for a used one.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: That year for Christmas, he surprised us all with a piano, and through the years, our children learned to play.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: When our sons grew up and left the house, the old piano just collected dust, so we sold it. A few years went by, and we had saved some money. One day Rudy said, “I think it’s time we get a new piano.”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: I asked, “Why would we get a new piano, when neither of us plays?”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: He said, “Oh, but we can get a piano that plays itself! By using an iPad, you can program the piano to play over 4,000 songs, including hymns, Tabernacle Choir songs, all the Primary songs, and so many more.”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Rudy is a great salesperson, to say the least.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: We purchased a beautiful new player piano, and a few days later, two big, strong men delivered it to our house.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: I showed them where I wanted it and moved out of the way.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: It was a heavy baby grand, and to fit it through the door, they removed the legs and managed to put the piano sideways on top of a moving dolly that they had brought with them.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Our house sat on a little bit of a slope, and unfortunately earlier that day it had snowed, leaving things wet and slushy. Can you see where this is going?

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: While the men were moving the piano up the little slope, it slipped, and I heard a big, loud crash. The piano had fallen off the moving dolly and hit the ground so hard that it left a big dent in our lawn.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: I said, “Oh, my goodness. Are you OK?”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Thankfully both men were OK.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Their eyes were wide as they looked at each other, then looked at me and said, “We are so sorry. We’ll take it back to the store and have our manager call you.”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Soon the manager was talking with Rudy to arrange delivery of a new piano. Rudy is kind and forgiving and told the manager it was OK if they just repaired the damage and brought back the same piano, but the manager insisted on getting us a new one.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Rudy responded, saying, “It couldn’t be that bad. Just fix it up and bring it over.”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: The manager said, “The wood is broken, and once the wood is broken, it can never sound the same. You will get a new piano.”

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Sisters and brothers, aren’t we all like this piano, a little broken, cracked, and damaged, feeling like we will never be the same again? However, as we come unto Jesus Christ by exercising faith in Him, repenting, and making and keeping covenants, our brokenness—whatever its cause—can be healed. This process, which invites the Savior’s healing power into our lives, does not just restore us to what we were before but makes us better than we ever were. I know that through our Savior, Jesus Christ, we can all be mended, made whole, and fulfill our purpose, just like a beautiful-sounding, brand-new piano.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: President Russell M. Nelson taught: “When sore trials come upon us, it’s time to deepen our faith in God, to work hard, and to serve others. Then He will heal our broken hearts. He will bestow upon us personal peace and comfort. Those great gifts will not be destroyed, even by death.” 1

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Jesus said:

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light” ( Matthew 11:28–30 ).

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: To heal brokenness by coming unto Him, we need to have faith in Jesus Christ. “Having faith in Jesus Christ means relying completely on Him—trusting in His infinite power … and love. It includes believing His teachings. It means believing that even though we do not understand all things, He does. Because He has experienced all our pains, afflictions, and infirmities, He knows how to help us rise above our daily difficulties.” 2

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: As we come unto Him, “we can be filled with joy, peace, and consolation. All that is [hard and challenging] about life can be made right through the Atonement of Jesus Christ.” 3 He has counseled us, “Look unto me in every thought; doubt not, fear not” ( Doctrine and Covenants 6:36 ).

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: In the Book of Mormon when Alma and his people were nearly crushed by the burdens placed upon them, the people pleaded for relief. The Lord didn’t take away their burdens; instead He promised them:

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “And I will also ease the burdens which are put upon your shoulders, that even you cannot feel them upon your backs, even while you are in bondage; and this will I do that ye may stand as witnesses for me hereafter, and that ye may know of a surety that I, the Lord God, do visit my people in their afflictions.

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “And now it came to pass that the burdens which were laid upon Alma and his brethren were made light; yea, the Lord did strengthen them that they could bear up their burdens with ease, and they did submit cheerfully and with patience to all the will of the Lord” ( Mosiah 24:14–15 ).

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: Of the Savior’s ability to heal and lighten burdens, Elder Tad R. Callister has taught:

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “One of the blessings of the Atonement is that we can receive of the Savior’s succoring powers. Isaiah spoke repeatedly of the Lord’s healing, calming influence. He testified that the Savior was ‘a strength to the needy in his distress, a refuge from the storm, a shadow from the heat’ ( Isaiah 25:4 ). As to those who sorrow, Isaiah declared that the Savior possessed the power to ‘comfort all that mourn’ ( Isaiah 61:2 ), and ‘wipe away tears from off all faces’ ( Isaiah 25:8 ; see also Revelation 7:17 ); ‘revive the spirit of the humble’ ( Isaiah 57:15 ); and ‘bind up the brokenhearted’ ( Isaiah 61:1 ; see also Luke 4:18 ; Psalm 147:3 ). So expansive was his succoring power that he could exchange ‘beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness’ ( Isaiah 61:3 ).

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: “Oh, what hope soars in those promises! … His spirit heals; it refines; it comforts; it breathes new life into hopeless hearts. It has the power to transform all that is ugly and vicious and worthless in life to something of supreme and glorious splendor. He has the power to convert the ashes of mortality to the beauties of eternity.” 4

speaker: Cristina B. Franco
role: Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
title: The Healing Power of Jesus Christ
paragraph_text: I testify that Jesus Christ is our loving Savior, our Redeemer, the Master Healer, and our faithful friend. If we turn to Him, He will heal us and make us whole again. I testify this is His Church and He is preparing to return once again to reign with power and glory on this earth. In the name of Jesus Christ, amen.
